column8: text

http://www.malaysiakini.com/news/367873MalaysiaKiniTunjuk bukti saya rasis, Kit Siang cabar Umno2 Jan 2017Ketua Ahli-ahli Parlimen DAP, Lim Kit Siang mencabar Umno dan ejen mereka untuk meneliti ucapan dan kenyataan yang dibuat dalam tempoh 51 tahun yang lalu dan kemukakan bukti beliau 'anti-Melayu, anti-Islam dan anti-raja Melayu'.Berucap di Raub malam tadi, Lim berkata, semua kenyataan dan ucapan beliau menjadi tatapan awam dan tidak pernah disembunyikan."Saya tidak fikir ada lagi pemimpin politik di Malaysia yang telah dituduh selama separuh abad yang lalu, dihina dan difitnah sebagai anti-raja Melayu, anti-Melayu dan anti-Islam."Saya menulis dan bercakap hampir setiap hari selama 51 tahun yang lalu dalam perjuangan politik untuk perpaduan, demokratik dan keadilan Malaysia, dan setiap perkataan dituturkan secara terbuka," kata Lim.Sehubungan dengan itu, Lim yang menganggarkan beliau pernah menutur atau menulis kira-kira 10 juta perkataan dalam kerjaya politiknya dan tiada seorang pun di kalangan pengkritik dapat menemui bukti beliau sebagai 'anti-Melayu, anti-Islam dan anti-raja Melayu"."Cabaran saya kepada para pemimpin Umno, ejen propaganda dan panglima perang siber untuk kemukakan bukti daripada lebih 10 juta perkataan yang saya telah tuturkan atau ditulis dalam 51 tahun yang lalu untuk buktikan saya anti-Melayu, anti-Islam dan anti-raja Melayu."Mereka dialu-alukan untuk teliti apa yang saya katakan atau tulis dalam 51 tahun yang lalu termasuk merekod kenyataan, buku, kaset dan video dengan Cawangan Khas untuk membuktikannya," ujar beliau.Lim menambah, sejak beberapa tahun kebelakangan ini, dakwaan paling biasa yang dilemparkan kepadanya adalah beliau menjadi punca rusuhan 13 Mei di Kuala Lumpur dan seorang 'komunis'.

column8: This guy has been accused of being racist for 40 years.Amazing.

1. For a long time it had been the official policy of DAP to not accept awards and decorations from the Rulers because that goes against DAP’s stand of being anti-feudal and anti-monarchy. DAP also issued an official statement that if they needed to observe the dress code when having an audience with a Ruler then they would rather not meet the Ruler. DAP does not mind using western attire but not any attire that is associated with the Malays or Islam even if protocol demands it.so dress code acceptance or reluctance is race?2. In 1990, Tengku Razaleigh Hamzah invited DAP and PAS to form an opposition coalition with Semangat 46. DAP said it would agree to join up with Semangat 46 only if PAS was not included in that coalition unless PAS first of all officially announces that it is abandoning the Islamic Sharia laws plus the idea of a theological state and agrees to accept the secular state.Laws is race?3. After the 2013 general election, DAP pushed for the ouster of the Selangor Menteri Besar, Khalid Ibrahim, to be replaced with Dr Wan Azizah Wan Ismail. HRH the Sultan of Selangor, however, would not accept Wan Azizah and His Highness made that known. His Highness also wanted the names of three candidates and not just one, as DAP and PKR stubbornly insisted. So PAS complied with this royal decree or titah.Race???4. DAP and PKR then challenged the Sultan and accused His Highness of violating the Constitution. DAP and PKR, however, did not explain whether they are talking about the Federal Constitution or the State Constitution and which Article of the Constitution they are talking about. DAP and PKR demonstrated biadap towards the Sultan and taught the people to hate the Sultan (as they did in Perak a few years earlier in 2009).logical talk = race????5. Basically, RUU355 is an amendment to the Sharia laws that were passed by the Kelantan State Assembly 24 years ago in 1993. This was never a problem in 1999 when DAP joined Barisan Alternatif or in 2008 when DAP joined Pakatan Rakyat. Today it is a problem for DAP because they need this as an excuse to punish PAS for not going against the Sultan of Selangor.no comment, too young/naive back then to know6. DAP’s action of using RUU355 as the excuse to break up Pakatan Rakyat and form Pakatan Harapan has triggered Islamophobia in Malaysia. Islam is now perceived as a pariah religion that must be stopped by any and all means because Islam is a dangerous religion that violates civil liberties and human rights. Furthermore, if the non-Muslims do not oppose RUU355, then, once passed, it would affect non-Muslims and non-Muslims would suffer beheading and amputation, says DAP.law of religion = race??plus the kelantan and brunei happenings not exactly give ppl confidencetalk is one thing, but to give examples to go with the points? well DAP not exactly Yuri, brainwashing the ppl  7. DAP’s hate campaign has succeeded and now non-Muslims hate Islam and view Islam as dangerous and a religion that must be eradicated. DAP has damaged race relations and a wave of Islamophobia is sweeping Malaysia. Islam, the Muslims, the Malays and the Rulers are the subject of attacks and Malaysians are no longer scared of saying things about Islam, the Muslims, the Malays and the Rulers, which in the past they would never have done.well when theres action there will be always reactionswe are now way past ruler of absoluteto bad the actions and non-actions made self look badand start to blame other for having a more clearer sight of what is true and what is lies

I can easily pick 1.For example point No.5, 6 & 7 has nothing to do with DAP.Non moslem do not need DAP to propagate anything to totally disagree on hudud.You think information about Hudud comes from DAP only?Isn't that a very stupid notion?
What has point No. 3 got to do with Anti Malay or Anti Islam?Isn't  Dr Wan Azizah Wan Ismail a malay and also a moslem?You just copy and paste and never bother to think?

This is what LKS said himself.“They (Umno leaders and cybertroopers) are welcome to comb through what I had said or written in the past 51 years, including the rooms of records of my statements, books, tapes and videos in the Special Branch, to produce proof that I am anti-Malay, anti-Islam and anti-Malay Rulers.”RUU 355 is a part of syariah law and go against it is prove that DAP is Anti-Islam.Anti-Malay Rulers.
Eh?  Dah kecut.

What has Point No. 4 got to do with Anti Melayu, Anti-Islam and Anti-Raja?The 2009 Perak constitutional crisis was a political dispute.LKS challenge the Sultan based on Article 16(6) of the Perak State Constitution. Sultan Nizar citing his discretion under Article XVIII (2)(b) of the Perak State Constitution.This is a matter of legal interpretation of the constitution.  If challenging this is deemed, anti-Melayu, anti-Islam dan anti-raja Melayu then we're just blindly allowing absolute power without any tinge of justice. This is DAP's defense.DAP chairman and Bukit Gelugor MP Karpal Singh issued a notice that he will file a lawsuit against the sultan and the new Barisan Nasional state government for acting beyond the state Constitution. Since the Election Commission had ruled that there was doubt over the vacancy of the state seats of Changkat Jering and Behrang (held by Osman Jailu and Jamaluddin Mohd Radzi respectively) after the pre-signed letters submitted by Assembly Speaker V. Sivakumar in relation to their resignation were contradicted by denials from both assemblymen, it triggered the provision of Article 33 (1). The provision stated that "if any question arises whether a member of the state Legislative Assembly has become disqualified for membership, the decision of the assembly shall be taken and shall be final".[33] Mohammad Nizar Jamaluddin also filed an application at the High Court to declare the swearing in of Zambry Abdul Kadir as unconstitutional and illegal.[34]
